thread.section_title: Prestige Flowers Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.prestigeflowers.co.uk
thread.title: Nigel Hayward
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Nigel Hayward

author: Nigel Hayward
title: Nigel Hayward
text:
1) These flowers were nothing like in the picture, it was supposed to be fresias and roses and it was just roses.
2) there was not half the amount shown in the picture, i could of brought a small bunch like this in Asda for about £6
3) no free chocolates as advertised
4) not delivered on day specified(Mothering Sunday,) arrived day before when it cost £5ish for delivery.
